author: al.kc
title: Small SPO Impact Business Programme
description: How can we enable SPOs to continue doing what they do best while creating effective businesses that achieve their purpose-led goals?
solution: To offer SPO businesses a proven 'business in a box' programme that ensures they own commercially sustainable impactful businesses.
experience: As Impact focused experts we run high growth coaching & mentoring programmes from tech startups, thru to Global businesses & Universities
